notes.note:
[Click-to-view Images option][1] in the menu’s advanced settings lets users choose which images on the Web they download to conserve data usage


  [1]: https://support.mozilla.org/en-US/kb/block-or-load-images-over-wifi-firefox-android
Introduce a new preference (*network.dns.blockDotOnion*) to allow blocking .onion at the DNS level

Add [toggle to disable sharing of camera][1] and microphone in admin UI for family friendly browsing


  [1]: https://support.mozilla.org/en-US/kb/controlledaccess#mobile::m45
Disable the inclusion of the URL when sharing selected text from web page
Simplified admin UI for family-friendly browsing on tablet in restricted profile
Support delivery of a Content Security Policy (CSP) via a meta tag
URLs containing a Unicode-format Internationalized Domain Name (IDN) are now properly redirected
